ResidentialLoanApplication.name: ResidentialLoanApplication
ResidentialLoanApplication.description: Represents details about a loan application from the lender.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the loan application.

AmortizationTerm.description: Duration of the loan in months.

ApplicationExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable).

BalloonTermMonths.description: Number of months during which the cumulative loan must be repaid.

EstateHoldType.description: Lender's lien is on both land and structure (fee simple) or just structure (leasehold).

HasOtherLoanFeature.description: Indicates whether loan has other amortization feature.

HasPrepaymentPenalty.description: Indicates whether penalty is incurred if borrower pays off loan balance before the loan term expires.

ImprovementCost.description: Construction costs for a construction loan or home improvement costs for a renovation loan.

InitialBuydownRate.description: Initial lesser interest rate for the loan.

IntOnlyTermMonthCount.description: Number of months that loan payments are interest only.

IsBalloon.description: Indicates whether borrower is applying for a balloon payment mortgage.

IsBorrowerCommPropState.description: Indicates whether at least one borrower lives in a community property state.

IsConstructionConversion.description: Indicates whether loan proceeds to provide permanent financing replacing interim construction financing.

IsContractConversion.description: Indicates whether loan proceeds is to pay off balance due on a contract for deed or land contract.

IsEnergyRelImprovement.description: Indicates whether loan is to finance energy-related improvements.

IsInterestOnly.description: Indicates whether borrower is applying for an interest-only mortgage.

IsNegativeAmortization.description: Indicates whether loan allows for negative amortization where shortfalls in interest payments are added to the outstanding loan balance.

IsPropertyCommPropState.description: Indicates whether property is located in a community property state.

IsRenovation.description: Indicates whether loan proceeds to finance cost of renovations to the property, and renovation value is included in the property's appraised value.

IsSingleClosing.description: Indicates whether construction and permanent loans have a single combined closing. Once construction is complete, the loan converts to a traditional mortgage.

IsSubjectToPriorityLien.description: Indicates whether property is currently subject to an energy-related lien that could take priority over the first mortgage lien.

IsTempIntRateBuydown.description: Indicates whether borrower is applying for loan with an initially reduced interest payment in exchange for an up-front cash deposit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeaseHoldExpirationDate.description: Date when leasehold expires if land is leased.

LoanPurpose.description: What the borrower will use the loan for.

LotAcquiredDate.description: Date the property or land was purchased.

LotOriginalCost.description: Original property cost (refinance) or original land cost (construction).

MonthsBeforeFirstAdj.description: Number of months before the first rate adjustment for an adjustable rate loan.

MonthsBetweenAdjustments.description: Number of months between subsequent rate adjustments for an adjustable rate loan.

MortgageLienType.description: Type of mortgage lien associated with this loan application.

MortgageProgramType.description: Type of mortgage program applied for.

Name.description: Name of the residential loan application.

NativeLandTenure.description: Property is located on an area reserved by or for an Indian land, village, or tribe to live on and use.

OpportunityId.description: The ID of the opportunity associated with the loan application.

OtherAmortizationType.description: Description of other amortization type for government loans.

OtherLoanFeature.description: Description of other loan amortization feature.

OtherLoanPurpose.description: What the borrower will use the loan for if other was specified.

OtherMortgageProgramType.description: Description of the other mortgage type.

OtherRefinanceProgType.description: Refinance program name if other was specified.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who owns this record.

PrepayPenaltyTermMonth.description: Number of months during which borrower incurs a penalty for early payoff of the loan balance.

ProjectType.description: Specifies the type of project that the property belongs to.

RefinanceProgramType.description: The applicable refinance program type based on the investor, guarantor, or lender guidelines.

Status.description: Indicates the current status of the loan application.

TitleType.description: Way the borrower or borrowers take title for the loan.

TotalFinLiabilityMonthlyAmt.description: Total monthly amount of borrowers' outstanding financial liabilities payments excluding real estate.

TotalFinancialAssetAmount.description: Total amount of borrowers' financial account assets excluding real estate.

TotalOtherAssetAmount.description: Total amount of borrowers' other assets excluding real estate.

TotalOtherFinLiabilityMonthlyAmt.description: Total monthly amount of borrowers' other monthly liability and expense payments excluding real estate.

TrustTitleType.description: Title to be held in a living trust or a land trust.
